description: Policy governing token creation within an economy registry.

mint_authority.description: Agent or entity authorized to mint tokens.

mint_constraints.description: Constraint IDs that must pass before minting.

max_mint_per_epoch.description: Maximum tokens that can be minted per epoch (string-encoded BigInt).

epoch_seconds.description: Duration of one minting epoch in seconds.

requires_governance_approval.description: Whether minting requires governance proposal approval.
